Articles.Content:
![sQo4yki.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sQo4yki.jpg)
**It's been 1 Year since Vagani Car Manufacturers was set up to provide cars for the community**

**Over the past year we have:**

-Released 92 Crafts

-Had 67000 Views

-Had 484 Replies

**And now announcing the 80s Sci-Fi Pack to commemorate the anniversary**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5MRFOFoXsH0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**The cars included are:**

-Vagani Lynx

-Vagani Lynx GT

-Vagani Flux

**Each have authentic 80s styling, from the hidden headlights to the angular body.**

![zooUHSo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zooUHSo.jpg)

![eWIlPko.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/eWIlPko.jpg)

![Ilfk8G3.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Ilfk8G3.jpg)

[**Download Today!!!!**](http://www./download/aa98npcd02cy5s0/80s+Sci-Fi+Car+Pack.rar)

![Fd4XIzM.png](http://i.imgur.com/Fd4XIzM.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T11:19:57Z" title="06/01/2015 11:19  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by Vagani**

80's cars? You could have done so much better. Still, though, they are good replicas of eyesore cars.

Do some 50's cars!
Nah, none of them are replicas, they're all completely made up, some might resemble others, but it wasnt intentional

With the last update and now all parts having actual mass, it makes cars and suspensions much cooler imo.

I'd like to see a Vagani motorcycle ^^
So, what is the thing on the back of the Lynx GT supposed to be, again?
Reminds me of a DeLorean. Do they come equipped with gull-wing doors?![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Yes what is the bit with the landing gear? Does it fly? That would be cool. I like these cars. GJ

> 
> So, what is the thing on the back of the Lynx GT supposed to be, again?

That is a super high tech spoiler that is also coincidentally good at chopping kerbals legs off if they stand too close to the kerb XD 

> 
> Reminds me of a DeLorean. Do they come equipped with gull-wing doors?![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Yeh aha, didn't mean to ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) well they did do but unfortunately the mechanism broke so now they jammed shut, guess you'll have to get in and out daisy duke style ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Yes what is the bit with the landing gear? Does it fly? That would be cool. I like these cars. GJ

shhh i have clips of it flying ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Thanks man
So your mission is to provide vags cars for kerbs yes? Funky italians
